content:
Over the past 24 hours, the enemy has inflicted 9 rocket launchers and 73 aircraft strikes, and made 72 shelling from rocket launchers on the positions of our troops and settlements.

About thisreported March 12The General Staff of the Armed Forces.

Unfortunately, Russian terrorist attacks are killed and injured among civilians. Multi -storey and private homes, as well as other civil infrastructure, were destroyed and damaged.

The enemy struck in the areas of settlements Soldativsk, Popivka, Luhivka of Sumy region; Muravskoye, Bologovka, Odnrobivka, Kozacha Lopan of Kharkiv region.

The artillery and mortar shelling of the enemy suffered more than 25 settlements, including Senkivka, Khrinivka, Bleshnya, Chernihiv region; Mid-Budda, Sukhodil, Malushine, Pavlovka, Krasnopillya, Popivka, Sumy region; Guiiv Kozachok, Gatyshche, Vovchansk, Bochkovo, Budarki, Ambin Kharkiv region.

He struck aviation in areas of Kupyansk, Kivsharivka of Kharkiv region. Over 10 settlements, including two -year, Sinkivka, Petropavlivka, Ivanivka, and Berestovo, Kharkiv region, were under artillery and mortar fire.

Also, the enemy struck in the areas of Serebryansky forestry of Luhansk region and areas of settlements Serebryanka, Proletarskoe, Seizhka, Razdolivka of Donetsk region.

About 10 settlements were injured from artillery and mortar shelling, including Nevsky Luhansk region; Torni, Tornske, Verkhnakamyanskoye, controversial, Rozdolivka of Donetsk region.

The enemy struck aviation in areas of the settlements of Bogdanivka, Friendship of Donetsk region. Also under artillery and mortar fire were about 10 settlements, including Mykolaivka, Vasyukivka, Bogdanivka, Yar, Ivanivske, New York of Donetsk region.

The enemy struck in the areas of settlements Alexandropol, Novokalinovo, Novobakhmutivka and Uman of Donetsk region. About 15 settlements have suffered artillery and mortar shelling, including progress, Vovche, Zhelane, Myrnohrad, Novogrodivka, Uman of Donetsk region.

The enemy also struck an aviation strike in the area of the settlement of Uzhizhyna of Donetsk region.

Under the artillery and mortar fire of the invaders were about 20 settlements, including Krasnogorivka, Berrystka, Konstantinovka, Antonovka, Katerynivka, Golden Niva, Blessed Donetsk region.

He struck a aviation strike in the area of the settlement Malynivka of Zaporizhzhia region. About 20 settlements, among them Malynivka, Gulyaypole, small Tokmachka, Novoandriivka, Mali Shcherbaki, Primorskoye of Zaporizhzhya region, have experienced artillery and mortar shelling.

More than 15 settlements have experienced artillery and mortar shelling, including the city of Kherson and Khreschenivka, Dudchany, Berislav, Stanislav Kherson region.

BeforeThe Armyinform reportedAbout two dead and 30 victims as a result of a rocket stroke of the Russian Federation on Kryvyi Rih.
title: The enemy has inflicted more than 150 rocket launchers
description: This was reported on March 12 by the General Staff of the Armed Forces. As a result of Russian terrorist ...
author: Army Inform
